results.title: Effects of simvastatin, ezetimibe, and their combination on histopathologic alterations caused by adjuvant-induced arthritis.
results.text_hl: The characteristics of diarthrosis were analyzed 7 and 28 days after @DISEASE_Arthritis @DISEASE_MESH:D001168 @@@arthritis@@@ induction with regard to the regularity and integrity of articular cartilage, the presence of leukocytes in blood vessels at the @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammation@@@ site, and the cytokine levels in articular tissue. Monotherapy with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ or @CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069438 @@@ezetimibe@@@ and the @CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069438 @@@ezetimibe@@@ + @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ combination effectively reduced the cytokine levels (@GENE_IL6 @GENE_24498 @@@interleukin-6@@@ and @GENE_LOC103694380 @GENE_103694380 @@@tumor necrosis factor@@@) and @<m>DISEASE_Intra_Articular_Fractures</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D057072 @@@articular lesions@@@ that are characteristic of this experimental disease.

citations.NLM: Barbosa CP, Ritter AM, da Silva LG, Grespan R, Cuman RK, Hernandes L, Bersani-Amado CA. Effects of simvastatin, ezetimibe, and their combination on histopathologic alterations caused by adjuvant-induced arthritis. Inflammation. 2014 Aug;37(4):1035-43. PMID: 24493323
